sourcesContent:
<template lang="pug">
  #login(style="background-color: #2196F3")
    v-sheet#login(style="height: 100%", color="tblue")
      h1.pt-6.white--text Login
      v-text-field.mt-6.mx-6(solo, placeholder="Email", v-model="email")
      v-text-field.mx-6(solo, placeholder="Contraseña", v-model="password", @keydown.enter="signin")
      .mx-6
        v-btn(color="white", block, light, :loading="loading", @click="signin") Iniciar Sesión
    v-sheet(style="position: absolute; bottom: 0; left: 0; right: 0", color="tyellow")
      .ma-6
        v-btn(color="black", block, dark, :loading="loading", @click="toSignup") Registrate

</template>

<script lang="ts">
import Vue from 'vue';

export default Vue.extend({
  data: () => ({
    email: '',
    password: '',
    loading: false,
  }),

  methods: {
    async signin() {
      console.log('Button clicked');
      this.loading = true;
      const result = await this.$store.dispatch('auth/signin', {
        email: this.email, password: this.password,
      });
      this.loading = false;
      if (result) {
        this.$emit('discard');
      }
    },

    toSignup() {
      this.$store.commit('stack/updateCards', [{
        type: 'signup',
      }]);
      setTimeout(() => {
        this.$emit('discard');
      }, 100);
    },
  },
});
</script>
